<center>
##People wait for their chance
##To go out and have a dance
##Yet he still prowls in wait
##Waiting of your date
##Nothing is more morbid
##Than COVID of the horrid
##He journeys to the lungs
##And there remains clung
##May all proceed with caution
##Or fight him as an option
